title: ACCEPTANCE LETTER FOR VOLUNTARY OFFER TO SELL (VOS)

fields.label: Registered Owner/s
fields.summary: Enter the name(s) of the registered owner(s)

fields.label: Approximate Area Covered (has.)
fields.summary: Enter the approximate area covered in hectares

fields.label: Location (Municipality, Barangay)
fields.summary: Enter the location details (municipality and barangay)

fields.label: Sketch map of the entire property
fields.summary: Submit a sketch map with delineation or shading of the area you intend to retain

fields.label: List of name/s of nominated child/ren as preferred beneficiary/ies
fields.summary: Enter the names of nominated children as preferred beneficiaries

fields.label: Duly attested list of tenants, lessees, and/or regular farm workers
fields.summary: Submit a duly attested list of tenants, lessees, and/or regular farm workers

fields.label: Received by
fields.summary: Enter the name of the person receiving the letter

aliases: CARPER LAD Form No. 20/ Page 1 of 2
